```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
library(hexbin)
```

```{r}
ces <- read_csv(here("data", "ces3demographics.csv" )) %>% 
  
  clean_names
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = ces, aes(x = white_percent, y = ces_3_0_score)) +
  geom_hex() +
  labs(x = "Percent of white population", 
       y = "CalEnviroScreen 3.0 Score", 
       title = "Relationship between CalEnviroScreen 3.0 score and percentage (%) of white population ") +
  theme_minimal()+
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "darkblue", high = "red")
```
